name: Snuggle Fabric Softener Dryer Sheets, Blue Sparkle Cuddle-Up Fresh, 230 Ct, Long-Lasting Fresh & Clean Scent, Softens Fabric, Reduces Static, Fights Wrinkles, Helps Repel Lint & Pet Hair, HE Safe
short_description: 5-in-1 Cuddle-Up Freshness: Snuggle dryer sheets reduce static, fight wrinkles, help repel lint and pet hair, soften fabric, and add a long-lasting fresh scent. Wrap yourself in the familiar fresh comfort of Snuggle

Long-Lasting Scent: These fabric softener sheets deliver softness and a fresh scent. Blue Sparkle is a clean blend of white florals and crisp green verbena that cozy up to warm woody notes, leaving laundry with long-lasting freshness* *out of storage

Freshness Beyond the Laundry: Experience a comforting scent that doesn’t stop at the dryer. These fabric sheets not only soften clothes, but can also be used in closets, gym bags, suitcases, and cars to help eliminate odors

Versatile for Any Dryer: Compatible with all dryers, including high-efficiency (HE) models. These versatile sheets offer a mess-free way to soften fabrics, making laundry care effortless. Pair with Snuggle Scent Booster for freshness

Convenience in Every Sheet: Easy to use - simply place on top of wet clothes or fabrics. Use one sheet for small loads, two for medium, and three for large loads. This box includes 230 sheets, offering familiar cuddly freshness with every load

Snuggle, the Familiar Comfort of Home: Embrace comfort every day, everywhere. Snuggle products bring comfort and care to laundry, delivering long-lasting freshness from wash to wear, making life's moments that much comfier. That's the Snuggle promise
product_description: Snuggle Blue Sparkle Cuddle-Up Fresh Dryer Sheets Feel comfy in your clothes with Snuggle Blue Sparkle Cuddle-Up Fresh Dryer Sheets. Depending on load size, just add 1-3 dryer sheets to your laundry to reduce static, fight wrinkles, soften fabric, and help repel lint and pet hair. Pets bring joy into our home, but pet hair can be an ongoing problem. Snuggle dryer sheets help prevent pet hair from clinging to your clothes. Snuggle dryer sheets also give laundry a long-lasting fresh scent—with a clean blend of white florals and crisp green verbena that cozy up to warm woody notes. These laundry sheets make it easy to wrap yourself in fresh and comforting Snuggle softness every time you wear your favorite outfits or slide into bed. Depending on your load size, simply place one, two, or three fabric softener sheets on top of wet clothes or fabrics and start the dryer cycle as usual. Then, discard after laundry is dry. Snuggle laundry sheets are HE friendly and can be used in high-efficiency dryers. Beyond the laundry room, these versatile sheets can also be placed in closets, gym bags, suitcases, and cars to help eliminate odors and leave behind a clean, comforting fragrance.

name: Soulink Fabric Softener Sheets for Washing Machine, No Plastic Jug Soap Strips, Alternative to Fabric Softener Liquid and Pods, Fresh Linen Scent, Up to 240 Loads
short_description: WASHING MACHINE SOFTENER SHEETS: Soulnk's ultra concentrated clothes softener is designed to soften clothes in the washing machine. This product easily and completely dissolves without leaving any residue on your clothes and can be used in any standard or HE washing machine on both hot and cold water settings.
INGREDIENT SAFE - Soulink fabric softener sheets are free of parabens, phosphates, bleach and dyes，also septic and gray water safe. It can be used on sensitive skin and babies.

EASY TO USE-Liquidlese design makes washing easy. No measuring is required, simply follow the directions and place the desired fabric softener strips. It won't stain your clothes and is lightweight and easy to carry, perfect for when you are traveling.

PROTECT YOUR CLOTHING - The agitation, spinning and heat of the laundry process can damage your clothes at the fiber level, as well as the static electricity caused by clothes rubbing against each other during everyday use. The use of soulink laundry softener sheetss reduces fiber damage caused by friction, fights static electricity, enhances softness, and reduces wrinkles. Static electricity can be caused by the friction of clothes in daily use.

ECO-FRIENDLY - Soulink uses more environmentally friendly laundry detergent tablets, both in terms of ingredients and packaging.All of Soulink's ingredients are environmentally friendly. We do not use plastic jugs in our packaging, which is lighter and more portable. Use biodegradable packaging to reduce carbon emissions!
